name: sa2_i04_selected_medians_and_averages_census_2016
title: SA2-I04 Selected Medians and Averages-Census 2016

legal.licenceType: Creative Commons Attribution 2.5 Australia (CC BY 2.5 AU)

abstract:
SA2 based data for Selected Medians and Averages, for 2016 Census. The median or average was calculated in the following categories: a person?s age, a person?s income, total household income, mortgage repayment, rental payments, number of persons per bedroom, household size and proportion of dwellings in need of one or more extra bedrooms. The data is by SA2 2016 boundaries. Periodicity: 5-Yearly.
For more information visit the data source: http://www.abs.gov.au/census.

selectedAttributes.name: med_age_psns_tot
selectedAttributes.title: Median age of persons Total
selectedAttributes.description: Median age of persons Total. Median age of persons excludes overseas visitors.
